title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update  roadmap update
description:
In this video, we'll explore the roadmap updates, bug reports, and the list of most requested features. The roadmap has undergone a significant update from its previous iterations, unveiling many exciting items set for release before the end of July.

So, sit back, relax, and prepare to be amazed!
